thread.title: All in all simply ok
thread.title_full: All in all simply ok - Review of Sofitel Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: RHW1974
title: All in all simply ok
text: Check-in friendly and efficient. Room ready. Got a nice spacious room with all one needs for a business stay. Had a good nights sleep. Check-out equally fast and friendly. Downside: nothing much (or at all) to do in the area - did not see any restaurant but given it rained heavily I also did not start walking around to look for one. Dinner at the hotel restaurant was ok - for a french benchmark vs. what one would get at a Brasserie, it was mediocre and simply too costly. Had the Burger, a soup, glass of wine and a coffee and paid over EUR 60. Would stay there again for a very late arrival and early departure as the location is good if you have to go to one of the DÃ©fense office buildings. For anything else and longer, would prefer to be in town. Also, to add, WLAN is slow and the complimentary service is slow and limited in data.
